description.value: You have power connected to the powerful jann amirs. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Read Omens]{Read Omens} and 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Invisibility]{Invisibility} each once per day as arcane innate spells, and you can cast detect magic at will as an arcane innate cantrip, heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.
